title: 3 and Out - Lincoln Riley to USC Stunner, Harbaugh's Bucks Beating, Belichick/Brady Keep Rollin
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Lincoln Riley to USC Stunner, Harbaugh's Bucks Beating, Belichick/Brady Keep Rollin
description:
John gives reacts to Lincoln Riley leaving Oklahoma to take the USC job, Jim Harbaugh finally beating Ohio State if the Wolverines can win it all, and gives some quick week 12 takes, including Brady and Belichick keeping it rolling. Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
